meanings.definition: Relating to the anatomy of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The neuroanatomical research focused on the brain's structure.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use neuroanatomical knowledge to understand brain injuries.
meanings.sent3: The neuroanatomical puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex web of neuroanatomical pathways.
meanings.sent5: The neuroanatomical diagrams made learning about the brain easy.

meanings.definition: The study of the structure of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Learning neuroanatomical helps understand how the brain works.
meanings.sent2: The neuroanatomical class covers the brain and spinal cord.
meanings.sent3: Studying neuroanatomical felt like exploring a hidden world.
meanings.sent4: In the neuroanatomical lab, students examined brain samples.
meanings.sent5: The textbook provided detailed neuroanatomical illustrations.
